short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make phone numbers on web pages clickable for easy dialing. Requires a PrimeVOX VoIP phone system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a link to all phone numbers, on all web pages, to initiate a Click-to-Call on your PrimeVOX phone system.

After setting up the extension, phone numbers will have a small phone icon next to them. When clicked, your extension(s) will begin ringing. Simply pick up the call, and you'll begin dialing out to the number you clicked.
